Assignment details
Relative Grading using AWK scripting
Dinesh Kulkarni
â€¢
Nov 1 (Edited Nov 4)
100 points
Due Nov 7, 11:59 PM
The statement will be available in 1/2 day, the deadline will be Monday, Nov 7, 2022.
Study AWK scripting during lab sessions.
DRAFT 

// Write an AWK script to compute the Relative Grading of 100 students ( Given for 5 courses, with the ISE(20), MSE(30), and ESE(50) components) based on "Standard deviation". Compare the results by applying the method individually on each component (ISE,MSE,ESE) and combining. The sample data file may be available shortly.
Your work
